t: Amazon.com: Schmidt Brothers - Zebra Wood, 7-Piece Knife Set, High-Carbon Stainless Steel Cutlery with Zebra Wood and Acrylic Magnetic Knife Block and Knife Sharpener: Home & Kitchen
s: Not wanting to spend a small fortune ... upon Schmidt Brothers. They're made in New Jersey, which is nice. I bought the Zebra wood 7 piece set, plus purchased a boning knife a few months later. I'm very happy with this set. Well balanced, stays very sharp with little maintenance. I don't sharpen but hone the edge back to straight every couple months and it'll slice a tomato paper thin with little pressure. Very happy with this brand...
